trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a date.
trans-unit.target: 날짜를 선택할 수 있는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The DatePicker control allows the user to select a date by either typing it into a text field or by using a drop-down <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: DatePicker 컨트롤을 사용 하면 날짜를 입력 하거나 텍스트 필드에 또는 드롭 다운을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Many of a DatePicker control's properties are for managing its built-in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>, and function identically to the equivalent property in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: DatePicker 컨트롤의 속성 중 대부분은 해당 기본 제공 관리 하기 위한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> 동등한 속성과 동일 하 게 작동 하 고</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: In particular, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.IsTodayHighlighted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.FirstDayOfWeek%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.BlackoutDates%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties function identically to their <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> counterparts.
trans-unit.target: 특히는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.IsTodayHighlighted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.FirstDayOfWeek%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.BlackoutDates%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 동일 하 게 작동 자신의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>함수와.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.BlackoutDates%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.FirstDayOfWeek%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.IsTodayHighlighted%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
Users can type a date directly into a text field, which sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 날짜를 설정 하는 텍스트 필드에 직접 입력할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DatePicker cannot convert the entered string to a valid date, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError> event will be raised.
trans-unit.target: DatePicker 유효한 날짜를 입력 한 문자열을 변환할 수 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>

trans-unit.source: By default, this causes an exception, but an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError> can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `false` and prevent an exception from being raised.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로이 대 한 이벤트 처리기 하지만 예외를 발생 시키는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>설정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>속성을 `false` 예외가 발생 하지 않게 하 고.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DatePicker supports only the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > The DatePicker 일반 달력만 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the DatePicker Control To apply the same property settings to multiple DatePicker controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 개의 DatePicker 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 동일한 속성 설정을 적용할는 DatePicker 컨트롤을 사용자 지정의 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the DatePicker, see [DatePicker Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및는 DatePicker 관련 된 상태를 보려면 참조 [DatePicker Syles 및 템플릿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
> [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 속성 시각적 단추 컨트롤의 기본 서식 파일에 속성이 있으며를 사용 하 여 설정 된 경우는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 선택할 수로 표시 된 날짜의 컬렉션을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dates in this collection will appear as disabled on the drop-down calendar.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션에 있는 날짜 드롭 다운 달력에서 비활성 상태로 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the user types a date that is not selectable, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 입력 된 날짜를 선택할 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>

trans-unit.source: To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method provided by the collection returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 모든 과거 날짜 하지 선택할 수 있는, 있습니다 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>이 속성에서 반환 된 컬렉션에서 제공 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a date to this collection when it is already selected or adding a date outside the range specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd%2A> will cause an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 이미 선택 된 경우에 날짜를이 컬렉션에 추가 하거나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd%2A> <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> 하면</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd%2A> 및</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> 로 지정 된 범위 밖에 있는 날짜를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* One or more object elements of type .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 속성 요소 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* . 형식의 하나 이상의 개체 요소

trans-unit.source: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.
Occurs when the drop-down <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 드롭 다운 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> 닫혀 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
To be added.
Occurs when the drop-down <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> is opened.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 드롭 다운 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> 열립니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
To be added.
Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 달력을 렌더링할 때 사용 되는 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the CalendarStyle property to specify the appearance of the drop-down calendar.
trans-unit.target: CalendarStyle 속성을 사용 하 여 드롭다운 달력의 모양을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *resourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**| None | # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *resourceExtension* 다음 중 하나: `StaticResource` 또는 `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
*styleResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey* 요청 되는 템플릿을 식별 하는 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
The style that is used when rendering the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 달력을 렌더링할 때 사용 되는 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.CalendarStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text*> is set to a value that cannot be interpreted as a date or when the date cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text*>날짜로 해석할 수 없는 또는 날짜를 선택할 수 없는 값으로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text*>

trans-unit.source: After the DateValidationError event occurs, if you set the property to `true`, one of the following exceptions is raised: |Exception type|Condition| |--------------------|---------------| ||The text entered cannot be parsed to a valid date, and the exception is not suppressed.| ||The text entered parses to a date that is not selectable.| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: DateValidationError 후 이벤트가 발생할 경우 속성을 설정 하면 `true`, 다음 예외 중 하나가 발생 합니다. | 예외 형식 | 조건 | |--------------------|---------------| | | 유효한 날짜를 입력 한 텍스트를 구문 분석할 수 없습니다 및 예외가 표시 됩니다. | | | 선택할 수 있는 날짜를 입력 한 텍스트를 구문 분석 합니다. | ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets the date to display.
This property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| This property allows the developer to specify a date to display if is `null`.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**|| 이 속성을 사용 하면 개발자가 하는 경우 표시할 날짜를 지정할 수 은 `null`.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *dateTimeString* 에 나열 된 형식 중 하나에 있는 날짜는 [DateTime XAML 구문](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The date to display.
The default is <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The specified date is not in the range defined by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateStart*>. and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd*>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 날짜를 정의한 범위에 있지 않습니다. <> </> *>. 및 <> </> *> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last date to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 표시할 마지막 날짜를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**|| # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *dateTimeString* 에 나열 된 형식 중 하나에 있는 날짜는 [DateTime XAML 구문](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 항목.

trans-unit.source: The last date to display.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the first date to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 표시 될 첫 번째 날짜를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**|| # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *dateTimeString* 에 나열 된 형식 중 하나에 있는 날짜는 [DateTime XAML 구문](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 항목.

trans-unit.source: The first date to display.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateStart*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the day that is considered the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: 일주일의 시작 부분으로 간주 되는 날짜를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek> that represents the beginning of the week.
The default is the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*> that is determined by the current culture.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.FirstDayOfWeek*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"> </xref> 에 포커스가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref> has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"> </xref> 포커스가, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the drop-down <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> is open or closed.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부 드롭 다운 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> 개방 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> is open; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> 고, 그러지 않으면 열려 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.IsDropDownOpen*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current date will be highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 현재 날짜가 강조 표시 됩니다 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**| None | # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ```

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current date is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 현재 날짜가 강조 표시 됩니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.IsTodayHighlighted*> dependency property.
To be added.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref> control when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 시각적 트리를 생성 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"> </xref> 새 템플릿이 적용 될 때 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 응용 프로그램 코드 또는 레이아웃 과정 다시 빌드 같은 내부 프로세스가 호출할 때마다 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.CalendarClosed"></xref> routed event.
The data for the event.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.CalendarOpened"></xref> routed event.
The data for the event.
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer"></xref> for use by the automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer"> </xref> 자동화 인프라에서 사용 하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance if one has not been created for the control instance; otherwise, it returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> previously created.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 만드는 새 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer>인스턴스 경우 컨트롤 인스턴스에 대해 생성 되지 않은; 그렇지 않으면 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer>이전에 만든.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref> object.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDateChanged"></xref> routed event.
The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDateChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDateChanged> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> 를 호출 하 여 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDateChanged> 를 발생 시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The data for the event.
Gets or sets the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: 현재 선택 된 날짜를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**|| # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *dateTimeString* 에 나열 된 형식 중 하나에 있는 날짜는 [DateTime XAML 구문](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 항목.

trans-unit.source: The date currently selected.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

The specified date is not in the range defined by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateStart*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DisplayDateEnd*>, or the specified date is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.BlackoutDates*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 날짜를 정의한 범위에 있지 않습니다. <> </> *> 및 <> </> *>, 지정 된 날짜가 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.BlackoutDates*>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.BlackoutDates*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate*> property is changed.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDateChanged"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Gets or sets the format that is used to display the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 날짜를 표시 하는 데 사용 되는 형식을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The format that is used to display the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 날짜를 표시 하는 데 사용 되는 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerFormat"></xref>.
The specified format is not valid.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDateFormat*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the text that is displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref>, or sets the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 표시 되는 텍스트를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"> </xref>, 하거나 선택한 날짜를 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> by typing a date into its text box.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 설정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>해당 텍스트 상자에 날짜를 입력 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> attempts to parse any string entered into this property as a date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>날짜로이 속성에 입력 된 모든 문자열을 구문 분석을 시도 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: While the Text property can be set to any string that can be parsed by the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method date, the format of the string that is returned depends on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Text 속성으로 구문 분석할 수 있는 문자열로 설정할 수 있지만 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>메서드 날짜의 값에 따라 반환 되는 문자열의 형식은 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> might display a string that is different than what the user typed.
trans-unit.target: 즉는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>는 다른 사용자가 입력 한 내용을 문자열로 표시 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: If Text is set to a date that is selectable and valid, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 선택 가능 하 고 유효 날짜로 설정 된 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError> event and set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true`, a <xref:System.FormatException> or <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is raised.

## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 **true**| None | # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 *dateTimeString* 에 나열 된 형식 중 하나에 있는 날짜는 [DateTime XAML 구문](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 항목.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref>.
The default is an empty string.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text*> dependency property.
To be added.
Provides a text representation of the selected date.
A text representation of the selected date, or an empty string if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 선택 된 날짜 또는 빈 문자열의 텍스트 표현을 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate*>은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.SelectedDate*>
